nodes.bodyText: I think a better solution would be to fix addToLibpath so it doesn't add entries that are already present, or perhaps better, eliminates all redundancy. Other entries are added to LIBPATH that might already be present (e.g. a VM process launching a child will end up with two (or more) occurrences .../lib/j9vm and .../lib/ppc64/compressedrefs).

nodes.bodyText:
addToLibpath has two modes: prepend and append.  We can remove the duplication in append mode but not prepend.
Considering this is the only append location, I'd rather handle it here then make the general function more complex
